title: I am losing at life. I need to write a PhD thesis in the next couple of months. I am finding a job in international market, visa issues, family problems, and stress. Life is out of control. What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: writing my thesis now. I feel your pain. allergic reaction for a whole year and nothing is working. I've got two person counting on me finishing my degree soon, me and wifey. Think about the pressure on you when your wife gave up a promising career just to be with you and you are 6th year in PhD. let alone this vivid crap. I can't go to my lab. hard to reach anybody. what can you do? what can we do? well, suck it up and work. dude you know what you have to do, so life is not out of control at all! come here, let's bitch about everything, then go back to reality, keep your head down and work.
What should you do? You know the answer; write that thesis and forget about all the other stuff.
